SELECT_MATCHING_UNITS.notes: Selects units by type visible on the screen. Double click to select all of the same type on the map

PLACE_BEACON.notes: Place a beacon on the map visible by your allies

VIEW_HOME_BASE.notes: Move the camera to your base

VIEW_LAST_RADAR_EVENT.notes: Move the camera to the last radar event

STANCE_AGGRESSIVE.notes: Apply aggresive stance to selected units

STANCE_BATTLE.notes: Apply battle stance to selected units

STANCE_HOLDGROUND.notes: Apply hold ground stance to selected units

CHAT_ALLIES.notes: Open chat box to send messages to allies only

CHAT_EVERYONE.notes: Open chat box to send messages to everyone

TOGGLE_CONTROL_BAR.notes: Toggle the visibility of the HUD

CAMERA_RESET.notes: Reset the camera zoom and rotation at its initial values

TOGGLE_FAST_FORWARD_MODE.notes: Toggle the fast forward mode when watching replays

ORDERMODE_WAYPOINT.notes: Enable order mode. Orders you give are executed one after the other as waypoint

ORDERMODE_IMMEDIATE.notes: Disable order mode. Orders you give are executed immediately and cancel previous ones

SAVE_VIEW1.notes: Save view n°1 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW2.notes: Save view n°2 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW3.notes: Save view n°3 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW4.notes: Save view n°4 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW5.notes: Save view n°5 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW6.notes: Save view n°6 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW7.notes: Save view n°7 at current camera position

SAVE_VIEW8.notes: Save view n°8 at current camera position

VIEW_VIEW1.notes: Move the camera to the view n°1

VIEW_VIEW2.notes: Move the camera to the view n°2

VIEW_VIEW3.notes: Move the camera to the view n°3

VIEW_VIEW4.notes: Move the camera to the view n°4

VIEW_VIEW5.notes: Move the camera to the view n°5

VIEW_VIEW6.notes: Move the camera to the view n°6

VIEW_VIEW7.notes: Move the camera to the view n°7

VIEW_VIEW8.notes: Move the camera to the view n°8
